title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, I receive an HTTP response code 200 OK with no content. However, I expected to receive an HTTP error 404.
OB: When I access a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, I receive an HTTP response code 200 OK with no content.
EB: I expected to receive an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance.
4. Verify that the HTTP response code is 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
